feed.title: Yamtrack Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.24.2
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixed CSV import error for seasons and episodes without a title or image provided #627 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/13b86cb28556d2fcd2e1ed0ce4ba37fd01b50503)

Other

  • Removed justified text alignment for media synopsis #556 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/9387a2b530f5acc4dcd2df17b2d354e579af747f)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.24.1...v0.24.2

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.24.3
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixed null dates displayed in the statistics timeline (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/9115e4aed4c5fcfe530d3871c2e6965f4859a927)
  • Fixed anime progress not updating in webhooks #631 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/37ac4919a41b8728b249470c6bff79bc8a50f646)
  • Don't stop Yamtrack CSV import on metadata fetching error #629 by @daften in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/630

New Contributors

  • @daften made their first contribution in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/630

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.24.2...v0.24.3

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.24.4
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Optimize database migration queries #637 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/639/commits/133d92d1c7179d45b156fc8302631373dc5db71a)

Maintenance

  • build(deps-dev): bump fakeredis from 2.30.0 to 2.30.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/645

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.24.3...v0.24.4

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.24.5
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixed media objects without start date not appearing in timeline #625 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/389c885fd734a2d8ef5dd5b37ad270448dccdf0a)
  • Fixed order of media objects in timeline #625 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/36c55e197d52fac9797d8659a50dba36bf5c69ee)
  • Fixed episode not found on import stopping import by @daften in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/642
  • Fixed not being able to delete media object from search page #653 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/ef3f0fe39ff89876192c9560101f42e4e54fece9)
  • Fixed updating in search result would create duplicate entries #675 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/ef3f0fe39ff89876192c9560101f42e4e54fece9)
  • Updated Kitsu API URL #680 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/a3fa08307685e1a6f5b784bec6d93d450a00bb5f)
  • Fixed error when TMDB doesn't return recommendations for a media #660 #670 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/ad92b91ac9637b27a36a8d1c3a198cd500ed6159)
  • Added DTSTAMP to the generated calendar.ics file #669 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/d28d22172358c651a4cab525b157cf8f681a7cf5)
  • Handle cases where Jellyfin sends duplicate webhooks #689 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/7f6bf59f8aeeba52c30f553da361fc477e8cd360)

Maintenance

  • build(deps): bump django-simple-history from 3.8.0 to 3.10.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/658
  • build(deps): bump pillow from 11.2.1 to 11.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/684
  • build(deps-dev): bump ruff from 0.11.13 to 0.12.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/677
  • build(deps): bump Django to 5.2.2 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/b05e24cad21486b89340043ea331010d958854ad)
  • build(deps): bump django-select2 to 8.4.1 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/b05e24cad21486b89340043ea331010d958854ad)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.24.4...v0.24.5

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.24.6
entry.content:
Features

  • Added current progress and total progress fields to the grid layout on the media list page (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/5a5d13f67b86d6284c3f96dd3cf4a55e81f5c712)
  • Added status and progress fields to media cards on the custom lists page and in the top-rated section of statistics (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/5d21eff438fb4c4ff5b02cd1e55d4f3017cc3749)
  • Don't show duplicates on the media list page, instead it will now show the latest entry along with a number indication the total number of entries #650 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/57e2375b762e3523e8f02a35514abd569eb2b505)

Fixes

  • Fixed unscored media being displayed first when sorting by score with PostgreSQL (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/2d680550ab2a845c55a0dd14310c3aed009ab6dd)

Maintenance

  • build(deps-dev): bump coverage from 7.9.1 to 7.9.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/691

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.24.5...v0.24.6
